feature.label: %featureName
feature.description: This is the runtime feature of the Graphiti framework. Graphiti supports the fast and easy creation of unified graphical tools, which can graphically display and edit underlying domain models using a tool-defined notation. Only this Graphiti feature is needed for creating Eclipse-based applications containing tools using Graphiti.
